Class ServletChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.channel.ServletChannel

    Channel

    public class ServletChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Channel
    Network channel for communication throught HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse.

    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com
